snippet.title: The Perfect Sniper - Gameplay Trailer | PS VR
snippet.description:
Available Now on PlayStation®4

The Romano family has taken over the city. Corrupt politicians and police agencies do nothing to stop them. Become the morally ambiguous champion this city needs as a Sniper in Virtual Reality.

The Perfect Sniper features a story mode, an arcade mode and tons of fun VR Sniper action.
DualShock®4 Wireless Controller, PlayStation®Move and PlayStation®VR Aim Controllers supported (gameplay varies).

Developer: Alek Sinn
Project Managers: Almir Brljak, Anas Siraj
Composer: Bedrija (Bedzo) Sinanoski
Voice Actor: Khalid Salam

Rated Mature: Violence, Blood, Strong Language

Sinn Studio Inc. © 2017-2018
